ui.panel.profile.logout_text: Are you sure you want to log out?
ui.panel.profile.force_narrow.descriptio: This will hide the sidebar by default, similar to the mobile experience.
ui.panel.profile.customize_sidebar.heade: Change the order and hide items from the sidebar
ui.panel.profile.customize_sidebar.descr: You can also press and hold the header of the sidebar to activate edit mode.
ui.panel.profile.vibrate.description: Enable or disable vibration on this device when controlling devices.
ui.panel.profile.enable_shortcuts.descri: Enable or disable keyboard shortcuts for performing various actions in the UI.
ui.panel.profile.suspend.description: هل نغلق الاتصال بالخادم بعد ان يكون مخفي لمدة 5 دقائق؟
ui.panel.profile.push_notifications.head: التنبيهات
ui.panel.profile.dashboard.description: اختر لوحة معلومات افتراضية لهذا الجهاز.
ui.panel.profile.advanced_mode.title: Advanced Mode
ui.panel.profile.refresh_tokens.descript: Each refresh token represents a login session. Refresh tokens will be automatically removed when you click log out. The following refresh tokens are currently active for your account.
ui.panel.profile.refresh_tokens.confirm_: Are you sure you want to delete the refresh token for {name}?
ui.panel.profile.refresh_tokens.delete_f: Failed to delete the refresh token.
ui.panel.profile.refresh_tokens.current_: Unable to delete current refresh token
ui.panel.profile.long_lived_access_token: Create long-lived access tokens to allow your scripts to interact with your ioBroker instance. Each token will be valid for 10 years from creation. The following long-lived access tokens are currently active.
Learn how to make authenticated requests.
Are you sure you want to delete the access token for {name}?
Failed to delete the access token.
Failed to create the access token.
Copy your access token. It will not be shown again.
You have no long-lived access tokens yet.
